resources.string: Printoid is downloading your timelapse file, please wait…
Timelapse downloaded to your internal storage (%s)
an error has been detected in the URL
the timelapse can\'t be found on your OctoPrint server
the timelapse can\'t be written on the storage

The timelapse rendering has been started by your OctoPrint server.\n\nPlease note that Printoid is not able to retrieve the status of the rendering process. If it succeed, the new timelapse will appear in your timelapses list.
Do you really want to delete the timelapse %s? This action can\'t be undone.
Printoid can\'t play your timelapse in its inner video player.\n\nWould you open this video in an another application instead ?
The selected video player does not have the permission to read the external storage.

Android is not able to play MJEG videos natively. Fortunately, VideoLAN Client™ (VLC™ Media Player) and MxPlayer™ are able to play them!\n\n Please install the app on your phone and don\'t forget to activate the \"Read external storage\" permission.
